actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide that an LNG facility may not be certified under section 7(C) of the Natural Gas Act unless the Governor of the State and the legislative body or bodies of the State in which such facility is or is to be located has approved the facility.

summary.text: Amends the National Gas Act to prohibit the issuance of certificates for the construction or extension of a liquefied natural gas facility unless the Governor and the legislature of the affected State has approved such facility in writing.

titles.title: A bill to provide that an LNG facility may not be certified under section 7(C) of the Natural Gas Act unless the Governor of the State and the legislative body or bodies of the State in which such facility is or is to be located has approved the facility.
